mapper.sql: eat_date, eat_week, restaurant_id, restaurant_name, service_unit_id, service_unit_name, count_a, count_b, count_c
mapper.select: SELECT EAT_DATE, EAT_WEEK, RESTAURANT_ID, RESTAURANT_NAME, SUM( COUNT_A ) AS COUNT_A, SUM( COUNT_B ) AS COUNT_B, SUM( COUNT_C ) AS COUNT_C FROM pz_census WHERE 1=1 AND eat_date = #{eatDate} AND restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND restaurant_name like concat('%',#{restaurantName},'%') AND eat_date >= #{beginDate} AND eat_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY RESTAURANT_ID, RESTAURANT_NAME, EAT_DATE, EAT_WEEK ORDER BY EAT_DATE
